price: Mu vy’ukuri, abo ijambo ry’Imana yawe Rurema Allah ryo kuvuma no guhana ryagiriye, ntibemera ivyemezo vyayo, eka ntibanayemera ngo bubahirize amabwirizwa yayo;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ḥaqqat ʿalayhim kalimatu rabbika lā yu'minūna
